P

S

setLetter(char) - Method in class model.NodeChar
Deprecated.
Changing the letter of an existing node is not safe as it may break the logical structure of the phone book. Letters should remain constant once assigned to maintain data integrity.
setNameList(NameList) - Method in class model.NodeChar
Sets the NameList for this character node.
